Title: Prueba
Description: AppInstaller.exe is spawned by the default handler for the "ms-appinstaller" URI. It attempts to load/install a package from the referenced URL
Columns: timestamp, user.name, host.name, process.executable, process.command_line, process.parent.name

Title: Prueba
Rule: process.name :"bitsadmin.exe" and ((event.action : "start" and process.parent.name :"bitsadmin.exe") or  (event.action :("creation" or "file_create")) or (file.name :"*:*"))
Description: Detects potentially malicious behavior involving BITS via bitsadmin.exe. This includes suspicious child processes spawned from bitsadmin.exe, creation of new files, and usage of alternate data streams
Columns: timestamp, user.name, host.name, process.executable, process.command_line, process.parent.name
